boy. The little boy said, "Hi parrot! Why do you rush?" The parrot said, "Big wind is coming! We need to hide!" The little boy and the parrot ran to a big tree to be safe from the wind.
In the tree, they saw something not normal. It was a big, shiny egg! The parrot and the boy looked at the egg and wondered what was inside. The egg started to shake and then it cracked open. Out came a baby dragon! The parrot, the boy, and the baby dragon became best friends and played together every day.

. The dolphin said, "Do not be scared. I will help you find your family." The dolphin and the fish swam together. They looked for the fish's family.
